import React, { useState } from 'react'; function Task(){ const [tilte, setTitle] = useState(""); const [subtilte, setSubtitle] = useState(""); const [description, setDescription] = useState(""); const [dateP, setDateP] = useState(""); const [dateE, setDateE] = useState(""); const collectData = async (event) =>{ event.stopPropagation(); var result = await fetch('http://localhost:8080/create', { method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify({tilte, subtilte, description, dateP, dateE}), header: {'content-Type' : 'application/json'}, action: '/create' }) result = await result.json; localStorage.setItem("Task", JSON.stringify(result)); } return (
setTitle(event.target.value)}/>
setSubtitle(event.target.value)} />
